title: Controlling Cost Overruns: How Predictive Analytics Mitigates Budget Risks
description: How predictive analytics can forecast cost overruns early â€“ using data models to flag budget risks and help keep construction projects on budget.
content:
Cost overruns are one of the most persistent challenges in construction. Traditional cost management relies on tracking actual expenses against budget, but by the time a variance is detected, it's often too late to prevent significant impact. Predictive analytics offers a proactive approach, using historical data and current project metrics to forecast potential cost overruns before they materialize.

This article explores how construction firms are leveraging predictive analytics to identify budget risks early, enabling project teams to take corrective action and keep projects on budget.
